item.title: Bundling JavaFX 12 on MacOS for a custom file extension using AppleScript
item.description: tldr: Link to Boilerplate on Github, see the follow-up post. I recently found myself in the position of wanting to bundle a small desktop application for interacting with a custom file type. It should recognise the file extension and be as minimal as possible, ideally acting as a thin layer on top of an existing code base. Said code base, to give some context, consists of a native c++ sdk and wrappers for mobile platforms.
